name: Cybernetic (gerarddiazvidal)
description:
In this adventure, a robotic spy has to infiltrate a secret base to find its darkest secret. Jump and run through the base and its traps to get to your objective. Get to know the AI of the base!

Short game made in less than a month by Gerard Díaz Vidal. The whole OST and vast majority of 3D assets have been created for this game. The only asset from a third party is the character and some textures.
